programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly volunteers for Hands Across America in hopes of getting closer to Barry and Erica; Adam promises to take his best friend and Dana to the school dance.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: News and features about performers, productions and the milieu.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: When an international beauty queen is killed on live television, the task force heads to Philadelphia to hunt down the killer; Hana senses that Ethan is hiding something.

programme.title: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: An archeologist and her ex-husband, an expert in ancient Norse languages, are sent to Iceland at Christmastime to search for the legendary treasure of the Yule Lads.

programme.title: A '90s Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic lawyer destined to spend Christmas alone is transported back to 1999 after an unexpected run in with a particularly wise ride-share driver.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Merry
programme.desc: Looking for a fresh angle for her book on relationships, Merry heads to snow-covered Vermont. She soon finds a new perspective and Christmas cheer when she meets a charismatic aid worker named Chris.

programme.title: Operation Nutcracker
programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur is trying to win over investors for the dating app she has developed. To help bring on investors for expansion, she promises to take part in using it in the coming weeks before Christmas to find love and track her progress.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: Joyeux Noel
programme.desc: When a romantic painting of a Christmas market captures the imagination of copy editor Lea, she travels to France with a pragmatic reporter to uncover the mystery behind the artist.

programme.title: Confessions of a Christmas Letter
programme.desc: After years of losing her community's Christmas letter competition, Settie Rose hires Juan, a struggling novelist, to depict her dysfunctional family in the best possible light.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: Sealed With a List
programme.desc: This holiday season, festive Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

programme.title: Holiday Road
programme.desc: Stranded at an airport, a group of holiday travelers agrees to rent a van for a road trip to Denver. When their unexpected journey leads them into uncharted territory, they must navigate a series of misadventures that brings them closer together.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: A lawyer makes a deal with the heir to a development firm to spare her family's restaurant from demolition. However, she must spend the week posing as the legal counsel his father is demanding he hire in the wake of some costly mistakes.

programme.title: The Finnish Line
programme.desc: Anya, inspired by her father's legacy, competes in Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival, and her own anxieties.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: When I Think of Christmas
programme.desc: Sara reunites with her ex-boyfriend, Josh, when she returns to her hometown to help her mother move. When Sara makes a surprising discovery, she and Josh forge a bold plan for an upcoming Christmas concert that takes them back to their musical roots.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility & Snowmen
programme.desc: Christmas party planners Ella and her sister Marianne clash with client Edward, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: Reunited at Christmas
programme.desc: As a child, Samantha spent every Christmas at her beloved Nana's house building the traditions of fun and joy with her family. Sam is facing the first Christmas without Nana and still struggling to find the Christmas spirit when she gets a surprise.

programme.title: Christmas Land
programme.desc: After inheriting a Christmas tree farm, a woman's plans to sell it change when she falls in love with the townspeople and meets a charming lawyer named Tucker.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A photographer returns home to take care of her grandmother and gets involved with helping a neighbor look after his young nephew.

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: A Cozy Christmas Inn
programme.desc: A real estate executive travels to Alaska during the holidays to acquire a bed-and-breakfast, only to discover it's owned by her ex. She's soon falling in love with the town and quite possibly him all over again.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream
programme.desc: A department store manager sets out to create an amazing holiday display window to impress the owner. She asks a recently-fired employee to help her make the display, and as they work together, they start to fall in love.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: An efficiency expert goes to Montana before the holidays and attempts to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Welcome to Christmas
programme.desc: A developer finds herself stranded in Christmas, Colo. The town hopes to employ the Christmas spirit to convince her that the community is the best location for a new ski resort.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a tour guide at his historic mansion and gets to experience a 21st century Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas for Keeps
programme.desc: During Christmastime, some childhood friends return home after 10 years to take part in a celebration of life for their beloved high school teacher.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen
programme.desc: Hoping to spur her longtime beau to action, a small-town veterinarian wishes upon a snow globe that this will be her most romantic Christmas ever.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes & Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: Weeks before Christmas, an interior designer is hired to decorate the estate of a wealthy businessman.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: Five More Minutes
programme.desc: Inspired by Scotty McCreery's song "Five More Minutes," a woman's Christmas wish is answered in unexpected ways when her late grandfather's journal turns up and reveals an untold romance.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: Five More Minutes: Moments Like These
programme.desc: Returning to her old home for the holidays, a young widow's Christmas wish for her son gets answered in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Project Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A woman's life becomes transformed as she works toward granting a little girl's wish for a Christmas like she used to have with her mother.

programme.title: Hope at Christmas
programme.desc: Sydney decides to spend Christmas in a house she inherited with her young daughter. When she meets Mac, he tries to make her Christmas wishes come true by helping her open herself up to life, love, and believing in the spirit of Christmas again.

programme.title: Five Gold Rings
programme.desc: An artist returns home for the holidays and gets tasked with a Christmas quest left by her grandmother. She and the local PI must return lost items to their owners before Christmas.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: After being told her new holiday app lacked Christmas spirit, a young CEO returns to her hometown to rediscover the meaning of the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas Encore
programme.desc: A struggling actress finds a renewed passion for her craft when she is cast in an off-Broadway show, a modern take on "A Christmas Carol.".

programme.title: Sleigh Bells Ring
programme.desc: A busy single mother (Erin Cahill) begins organizing her city's Christmas parade. While prop hunting, she finds a beautiful sleigh that seems to have a mind of its own, and it begins nudging her back to an old flame (David Alpay).

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: My Christmas Love
programme.desc: A hopeless romantic (Meredith Hagner) begins receiving the gifts from "The 12 Days of Christmas" from an anonymous suitor.

programme.title: Christmas Sail
programme.desc: When Liz returns home to take care of her estranged father, she is determined to give her daughter a perfect Christmas.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Dashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: A young woman becomes stranded in an airport at Christmastime and accepts a ride from a man who rented the last rental car in town. As they head north, a hint of romance develops when they encounter a few bumps on the road.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: The Perfect Christmas Present
programme.desc: Tom Jacobs has built a business around helping clients find the perfect gift for their loved ones. When he's hired to find a gift for his friend's girlfriend, he finds himself in a bit of trouble: The more he researches her, the more he likes her.

programme.title: A Novel Noel
programme.desc: A NYC book editor takes on a temporary gig running a Maine bookstore. Battling with the owners' son, she rediscovers her passion for nurturing creativity.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: As his showdown with Lord Voldemort (Ralph Fiennes) nears, Harry (Daniel Radcliffe) may have to make the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Aided by Tinker Bell (Julia Roberts), a corporate lawyer (Robin Williams) turns into Peter Pan to rescue his children from Captain Hook (Dustin Hoffman).
